storyName: Find Your Way Through the Snow
storyInfo:
The leaders of the three clans arrive at Karlan Square, taking part in the Holy Hunt's ceremonial vows.
As the advent of the Ceremony nears, each clan has their own ideas.

attributes.content: Sir, have some water.
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: You haven't had so much as a sip since yesterday. You still have a hunt later. This is too...
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: No need.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: But––
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: This is my decision.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Don't make me say this twice, Matterhorn.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Give it up, Matterhorn.
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: You know better than anyone how stubborn Sir Enciodes is. You knew he wouldn't accept, so why ask?
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: I must at least try.
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: This is too... risky.
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: Risk and opportunity are two sides of the same coin. It's always been this way for us.
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: All we have to do is listen to him.
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: Phew...
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: It's cold. The snowstorm is getting stronger, isn't it?
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: He's taking too long.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: What a showy guy he must be to have the two other clans wait for him?
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: He's walking all the way here. That's not so bad, if you ask me.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: What a surprise. You are commending him? From what I heard, Enciodes is enjoying quite the celebrity status on his way here.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: Arctosz, you'd best be careful. Give it a few more days and Kjeragandr's most devout follower will be Enciodes instead of you.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: Enough of your jabs, Ratatos.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: I don't trust Enciodes, but if he does right thing, who am I to argue?
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Now if you brought me here just to say this, you'll have to excuse me.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: I don't have so much free time on my hands, Arctosz.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: I just wanted to remind you.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: Remind me? There's nothing I need you, of all people, to remind me of.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Are you sure about that?
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: Arctosz, bickering at each other isn't going to help either of us. Given the circumstances, our families have the strongest ties.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: I'm not the one who's bickering, Ratatos.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: I don't like how you and Enciodes are always beating around the bush. I care about actions and nothing else.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: You care about actions. Perfect, then.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: Let's talk about the explosion two days ago.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: What? Are you going to tell me that was the Browntails' doing? Hmph, I'm not falling for that. That's not your style.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Or are you trying to say you know who's behind it?
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: What if I tell you I really do...?
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: —You're not kidding?
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Definitely not.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: Why don't you take a guess who gave us a helping hand?
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: Monch, Monch!
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: Just where did she go...?!
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: Are you looking for me, Madame?
attributes.name: Monch

attributes.content: Do you really need to ask?!
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: You're usually pretty quick on your feet. Why're you wandering about like you're going to the park, now of all times?! I told you we must be ready for this hunt... Whatever, how are preparations going?
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: To tell you the truth, Monch, you're the most dependable warrior I have.
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: It's all down to you whether I can bring honor to the Browntail clan and get back at that bitch Ratatos!
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: Madame, if I may speak my mind...
attributes.name: Monch

attributes.content: If you have something to say, say it!
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: Right.
attributes.name: Monch

attributes.content: As I see it, if you truly wish to impress Matriarch Ratatos with such a fine performance that she sees you in a new light, I'm afraid you should set your eyes on more than just the hunt.
attributes.name: Monch

attributes.content: I'm aware of that... but what else could I do?
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: Ratatos always has everything thought out well in advance. It's like she's not giving me any chances. Hmph, I'll admit she's a little smarter than me.
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: But I... I'm not useless either!
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: That's why you have to make sure you do your job well, no matter what it takes, Monch!
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: You and I will sap some of that stinking bitch's arrogance together! I will show her how amazing I can be!
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: I understand how you feel about the Browntails, Madame.
attributes.name: Monch

attributes.content: But in that case, you should really set your eyes on more than just the hunt.
attributes.name: Monch

attributes.content: Tell me, then. What else could we do?
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: If you trust my judgment—
attributes.name: Monch

attributes.content: What're you talking about? If I don't trust you, who else could I trust?
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: I appreciate your trust, Madame. So please leave this matter to me. I have a few ideas... but we need to be careful. It's not the right time to jump to conclusions.
attributes.name: Monch

attributes.content: As for you, Madame, to make sure everything goes well, please do not tell Sir Yucatan about this affair.
attributes.name: Monch

attributes.content: Not even Yucatan?
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: Right. He's always in the way, treating me like a little girl. He even tells on me to Ratatos. As if I don't know...
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: I'll leave everything to you, Monch! Don't disappoint me!
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: Of course. Please rest assured...
attributes.name: Monch

attributes.content: When all is said and done, I will make sure you will get your time in the limelight.
attributes.name: Monch

attributes.content: 'The sound of the bell rings from Her purest soul. Those who love Her cast their heads down to listen, and Kjeragandr shines her countenance upon all Her faithful children.'
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: —Listen. The bells of the hour have chimed.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: You were almost late, Sir Enciodes.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: I beg forgiveness.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: The path of enlightenment is always a treacherous one. This, too, must be one of Kjeragandr's trials for the Silverashes.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: You walked all the way from Turicum to Mount Karlan. It must have been an exhausting journey.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: However... I hope you will find your right path forward.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: With your blessings, Great Saintess, the path ahead is shrouded no more.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Even as we speak, I am making my way toward Kjeragandr's teachings.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: You have a fine way with words, Sir Enciodes.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: You flatter me.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: I am profoundly humbled to be welcomed by the Great Saintess herself.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: With the pomp and circumstance of your entrance, I wouldn't dare to give you the cold shoulder, Sir Enciodes.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Where can I find the Great Elder, if I may ask?
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: The Great Elder is preparing for the ceremony. Such is why I'm here to receive you myself.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: For this Holy Hunt, I shall follow Kjeragandr's will and stand alongside you to bring this ceremony to a successful conclusion.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: You mean... you will personally take to the hunting grounds?
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Do you too think my decision is a rash one, Sir Enciodes?
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Not in the slightest.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: I'm simply overcome with emotion. It seems you have come to realize the gravity of your position as leader of the three clans. It's a fortunate thing for Kjerag.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: It's my responsibility.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Great Saintess, Sir Enciodes, the Holy Hunt will begin shortly. Please hurry.
attributes.name: Servant

attributes.content: It's nearly time.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Please come with me, Sir Enciodes.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: After you, Great Saintess.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Sir Enciodes.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: What is it?
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Whether your path is right or wrong, Kjerag has its own path to follow.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: No one can decide for all of Kjeragandr's children.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: I feel the same way...
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Our merits are not for others to judge. Now that things have come to this, there is no reason for me to back away. With my actions...
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: —I did all that I could, nothing more.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: By Kjeragandr.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: I, as Saintess, hereby declare.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: I shall lead Kjerag's finest warriors to find and lay waste to all the Tschäggättä hiding in the mountains, so that Kjerag may have peace.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: By Kjeragandr.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: I, Arctosz, as always, will lead my warriors of the house of Paleroche, following the Saintess in her quest to find all Tschäggättä hiding in the mountains.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: And to bring back the most magnificent prey.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: By Kjeragandr.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: I, Ratatos, as always, will lead my warriors of the house of Browntail, following the Saintess in her quest to hunt down all Tschäggättä hiding in the mountains.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: And to bring back the most exquisite prey.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: By Kjeragandr.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: I, Enciodes, as always, will lead my warriors of the house of Silverash, following the Saintess in her quest to suppress all Tschäggättä hiding in the mountains.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: And to bring back the most ferocious prey.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: May our faith reach Kjeragandr, and may prosperity reach Kjerag.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: May our faith reach Kjeragandr, and may prosperity reach Kjerag...
attributes.name: Great Elder

attributes.content: May our faith reach Kjeragandr, and may prosperity reach Kjerag.
attributes.name: Tri-Clan Leaders

attributes.content: —May our faith reach Kjeragandr, and may prosperity reach Kjerag!
attributes.name: Everyone in Attendance

attributes.content: Everyone, please check your equipment.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Let the hunt begin!
attributes.name: Enya
